attributes.action: Establish a government of national unity.
attributes.additional_details:
The current government is ill equipped to deal with such matters as Covid-19 or the EU withdrawal repercussions. Matters related to both cannot and must not be dealt with by decree. 
Political issues must be set aside in order to deal with the challenges facing the four nations of the UK.
attributes.background: Approve a national government of unity from each of the main political parties: Labour, Liberal Democrat, SNP and, Conservative to deal with the crisis that is Covid-19 & allied issues including economic, trade and employment crises confronting all 4 nations of the UK as we withdraw from the EU.
